title: Mavs dysfunction, Injury woes, and Sixers collapse
description:
Zach talks to ESPN's Tim MacMahon about dysfunction in Dallas, ESPN's Baxter Holmes and injury expert Jeff Stotts on the wave of injuries league wide, and Spike Eskin of the Rights to Ricky Sanchez podcast on the Sixers epic collapse in Game 5.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
